page.title: 09Community Events
page.content: In the summer, the School Sports are held on the football field and parents come to watch.The District Sports are held in Rhymney Comprehensive School and we meet other schools.The Gala for swimming is held at Heolddu School and parents can watch the competition with other children.Each year in Rhymney, Fochriw and Pontlottyn,Carnivals and Jazz Band Competitions are held.A Fete is also held on the football field.Our school also goes to Camp Week at Ogmore with other schools.In the autumn we have the School Concert.Our play was A Chritmas Carol.We also held our Christmas Parties.On Saint David's Day we have our Concert of Music and Poetry.The 5 a side soccer and 7 a side rugger tournaments are held in Bargoed.The netball tournament is held in Rhymney.
